question: You have recently moved into a new house. You want to tell your friend about your good news.Write to your friend. In the letter:• Describe the house.• Describe the neighbourhood.• Invite your friend to come and see the house.
text: Hope things are fine at your end. I am really excited to share this news with you. I have shifted to a new apartment in Etobicoke. It has been 3 days since I moved from downtown, Toronto and I am thrilled to let you know about my new place.

So it actually is on the 23rd floor of Valhalla inn apartments. It is a 2 BHK apartment, fully furnished and with all amenities. I love the modular kitchen, it is easy to clean every time the kitchen gets dirty. The supermarket is only a 2-minute walk from my place and there is a park for kids next to my building. I was surprised to see a library on the corner of my street, as you know I am a book lover. I must mention the Italian restaurants in my neighbourhood.I just can't wait to take you there for I heard they have 60+ varieties of pizza.
You must now be knowing how excited I am to reside in this place. I am hoping to see you around sometime, probably over the weekend. You can spend a night with me and we can have a gala.
Looking forward to seeing you soon.
